title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: The BIRT designer does not generate and save relative paths when a library is included in a report design.
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path for the library.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a report design in the BIRT designer.
2. Include a library from a different location using a relative path, for example, $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
